cause.description:
You can register as an organ donor 24x7x365 at this site so please register and share with your friends. http://www.organdonor.org/index.html
1. Maintain the only online 24 x 365 National Organ and Tissue Donor Registry.
2. Register all Americans as organ donors.
3. Provide research funding for the scientific development of artificial organs and lifesaving bridge technology.
4. Aggressively advocate for the enactment of nationwide 1st Person Consent Legislation
cause.mission: Register all Americans as Organ Donors
cause.name: National Transplant Society
